actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to limit the terms of members of the Board to 4 years and to alter the composition of the membership.

summary.text: Limits the terms of members of the Federal Reserve Board to four years and changes the rules with respect to the appointment of new members of the Board as vacancies are created.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to limit the terms of members of the Board to 4 years and to alter the composition of the membership.
